*** Bug 99285 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

From Vernon via email:

This crash occurs while I type quickly and with some
actions on the Alt, Ctrl, Shift, or enter keys. It
occurs almost every single time when I edit a message
property file.  

I have been using the Eclipse since the 1.x version
and have not run into this problem until the 3RC1
version. So you might want to take a look at any
related code changes after the M7 version.

Hi Vernon.  Can you give me some example steps?  For example, I am able to 
edit a message property file.  Does it happen when you create a new project?
The code base has changed significantly since this bug was reported.  If it is still happening for you, please reopen this bug report.
